data.message: I love how everybody calls MMLP2 a bad album because he's not rapping like he was I'm his 20's. If you love hip-hop and Eminem, you'd realize this is a masterpiece. It visits each of his older albums.

replies.message: I know right. They probably turned into Drake fans and think he is better. He made a song about starting from the bottom. This guy was a child actor playing Wheelchair Jimmy and was born in a suburban area of Toronto.
i love it,  i just hate monster,  survival,  and headlights(because of the other dude,  i loved the emotional mom stuff)

Adrian, watch the ideo for "The Monster" if you already haven't. It's brilliant. "Survival" is a good song, and I'm not a fan of the beat, but the lyrics are solid. Nate Reuss's voice isn't too great, but it did suit "Headlights" enough to where it was bearable.
